markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Solar Shellflower](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1892)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Arcane" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=11" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 39 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 160 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Flintlock Musket](/Weapons.aspx?ID=191)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [flintlock musket](/Weapons.aspx?ID=191)_ features multiple triangular panels that can be folded out of the stock, like the petals of a tigridia flower, that collect sunlight and feed it into the spark gun's core. All damage dealt by a _solar shellflower_ is fire damage.

<document level="2" id="action-1587" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Solar Shellflower
